messages: 75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (19:23): when I spool file in oracle
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (19:24): may I add  the date in the spool file, such as: define reporting_date=sysdate; spool report_(&reporting_date)?
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (19:25): then how could  I do it?
443a9547033ec9d695ae9d29e8df98b1 (19:25): you need to a column baho into thing ... and select sysdate baho from dual; and use &thing
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (19:26): may u tell me an example or give me keyword so that I may search in the google. thanks:D
443a9547033ec9d695ae9d29e8df98b1 (19:38): was away for a bit.. 1 sec
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (19:48): yeah, I got it, thanks a lot, hali:D
ede74f5c4a151a239e1c7df860326a26 (20:09): can I pass target directory for spool via commandline arg?
ede74f5c4a151a239e1c7df860326a26 (20:10): that has its merit too
443a9547033ec9d695ae9d29e8df98b1 (20:13): and have connect foo/bar in your script
443a9547033ec9d695ae9d29e8df98b1 (20:14): or just spool with the fqpn
607c4806ca15b47dcc0effd779440d55 (20:18): use () so you don't actually change your current working directory
607c4806ca15b47dcc0effd779440d55 (20:23): i forget about parms like that
ede74f5c4a151a239e1c7df860326a26 (20:27): &1 is same as $1 in bash?
ede74f5c4a151a239e1c7df860326a26 (20:27): i just use $DIR env variable

2fcc1af54942f1bdefc18f4e88f2ac7c (20:34): anyone aware of shared_server statistics?  I just saw a spike from our 10 to 20 and it quickly kills them off... like really quick, so I'd like to see some stats.
2fcc1af54942f1bdefc18f4e88f2ac7c (20:35): rather than trying to catch it when it happens.
2fcc1af54942f1bdefc18f4e88f2ac7c (20:45): judging by the current load if we only had 4 processors we would be hatin it.  Damn you oracle licensing.
2fcc1af54942f1bdefc18f4e88f2ac7c (21:00): CPU based licensing seems like bullshit to me.  You bought the software, you should be able to run it on as many processors as you can afford.
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (21:03): hali: hi, when I have ttitle on
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (21:03): they always have "page #" on the right side of the reports
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (21:03): how may I only delete it but keep the date on the left side?
443a9547033ec9d695ae9d29e8df98b1 (21:09): ttitle center _DATE skip 1 center 'My cool report'
443a9547033ec9d695ae9d29e8df98b1 (21:09): replace the first center with left to get left justified
2fcc1af54942f1bdefc18f4e88f2ac7c (21:23): hmm my boss is wondering about this wait stat.
2fcc1af54942f1bdefc18f4e88f2ac7c (21:23): I have 5 dispatchers but doesn't seem to make much difference.
75273e2d05e97198fa881ed7690ca760 (21:36): hali: got it, thank you very much:D
